result.title: Invitation to Overnite Coding
result.content:
Hi everyone.

The much awaited BIT Mesra Overnite Coding is here to endeavour with a challenging problem set and exciting prizes to be won. Get yourself ready to hone your programming skills and take home the respect and swag :)

It is an individual event. The duration of the contest is 3 hours. The contest is themed on Naruto. Hope you enjoy the problem set and the problem statements.

There will be subtasks in the problems for greater competition and to ensure lesser number of participants corresponding to a particular score.

The contest will be held on 17th February, 2018 at 22:30 IST.

Contest Link : BIT Mesra Overnite Coding

Problem Setters : Me (sinhashubham95), Mohit (mohitbindal) and Pratik (pratik_ritesh).

The problems will be of varying difficulty- from cakewalk to hard. Register now to be eligible for prizes. All the Best :)

Update 1: Less than 4 hours left in the start of the contest. All the best :)

Update 2: The contest has started. Happy coding :)
